author: trent_vanepps
content:
<@&857649635274915900> folks üëã As I mentioned on the standup today, we will be issuing a POAP to everyone who completed Cohort Zero! POAPs are event based NFTs which prove your participation.

The only requirement: write up your **showcase profile**! This is important for wrapping your participation in the program & informing how we approach future cohorts. The deadline will be **Nov 15**, so please do it soon - especially if you received funding support üôè 

See Piper's example and add yours here: https://github.com/ethereum-cdap/cohort-zero/tree/main/showcase
